PDIP DKI Sayangkan 2 Anak Buah Anies Mundur saat Heboh Anggaran
02 Nov 2019, 08:44 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - Fraksi Partai Demokrasi Indonesia Perjuangan (PDIP) DPRD DKI Jakarta menghargai sikap dua pejabat DKI Jakarta yang mundur. Namun, PDIP menyayangkan tindakan dilakukan saat pembahasan rencana anggaran 2020.
"Sayang saja, kok saat pertempuran (pembahasan anggaran) sedang berjalan. Pertempuran mempertahankan idealisme yang dia perjuangkan ketika lakukan perencanaan," ucap Ketua Fraksi PDIP DKI Jakarta, Gembong Warsono saat dihubungi, Jumat (1/11/2019).
Bagi gembong, Kepala Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan (Kadisparbud) Edy Junaedi, dan Kepala Badan Perencanaan Pendapatan Daerah (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra masih harus memimpin lembaganya dalam rapat dengan DPRD. Meski ada pengganti, tapi tidak akan lebih bagus dari mereka.
"Kalau pengganti, ya bisa. Sistem ASN kan berjalan baik. Tapi, pengendali kan yang bersangkutan. Kalau soal jalan, penggantinya ya jalan. Sekali lagi, yang memahami roh yang dibahas kan yang bersangkutan," ujar Gembong.
Gembong pun menyebut ada kemungkinan dua kepala lembaga itu merasa tidak nyaman karena kasus diketahuinya rencana anggaran aneh kepada publik. Sehinga, mereka memilih mundur tidak lama setelah informasi itu ramai dibahas.
"Soal mundur atau tidak, itu sikap kesatria yang bersangkutan. Dia merasa berdosa mundur, bisa saja. Bisa juga sebaliknya, ibaratnya mempermalukan saya (Gubernur), ya dari gubernur bisa saja kan," kata Gembong.

PDIP DKI regrets 2 Anies subordinates retreating during a budget frenzy
02 Nov 2019, 08:44 by Arief Ikhsanudin
Jakarta - The Jakarta Democratic Party of Struggle (PDIP) Faction of DKI Jakarta DPRD appreciates the attitude of two DKI Jakarta officials who resigned. However, PDIP regretted actions taken during the discussion of the 2020 budget plan.
"It's a shame, how come when the battle (budget discussion) is underway. The battle is maintaining the idealism that he fought for when planning," said Chairman of the Jakarta PDIP Faction, Gembong Warsono when contacted on Friday (11/01/2019).
For the kingpin, the Head of the Tourism and Culture Office (Kadisparbud) Edy Junaedi, and the Head of the Regional Revenue Planning Agency (Bappeda) Sri Mahendra still have to lead their institutions in a meeting with the DPRD. Although there are substitutes, but it will not be better than them.
"If it is a substitute, yes it can. The ASN system is going well. But, controlling is concerned. If it's about the way, the successor is the way. Once again, those who understand the spirit discussed are those concerned," said Gembong.
The kingpin also said that there was a possibility that the two heads of institutions felt uncomfortable because the case was discovered by the strange budget plan to the public. So, they chose to retreat shortly after the information was widely discussed.
"The matter of resigning or not, that's the attitude of the knight in question. He feels guilty backward, it could be. It could also be the opposite, like making a fool of me (the Governor), yes from the governor it could be right," said Gembong.
